mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ML_MATTER_FILE ( ID, TASK_GUID, MATERIAL_NAME, MATERIAL_TYPE, MATERIAL_FORMAT, IS_NEED, FORM_GUID, EXAMPLE_GUID, SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_EXPLAIN, PAGE_NUM, PAGE_FORMAT, FILL_EXPLAIN, ACCEPT_STAND, BY_LAW, REMARK, ORDER_NUM, HANDLE_CASE, IS_SELF, CATALOG_FILE_ID, COPY_EXPLAIN, ISDEL, ORIGINALNUM, COPIESNUM, TENANT, TMS, VNO, TXN_ITT_CHNL_CGY_CODE, TXN_ITT_CHNL_ID, DAC_VERF ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{taskGuid} , #{materialName} , #{materialType} , #{materialFormat} , #{isNeed} , #{formGuid} , #{exampleGuid} , #{sourceType} , #{sourceExplain} , #{pageNum} , #{pageFormat} , #{fillExplain} , #{acceptStand} , #{byLaw} , #{remark} , #{orderNum} , #{handleCase} , #{isSelf} , #{catalogFileId} , #{copyExplain} , #{isdel} , #{originalnum} , #{copiesnum} , #{tenant} , #{tms} , #{vno} , #{txnIttChnlCgyCode} , #{txnIttChnlId} , #{dacVerf} )
